Jacksonville, FL Metro > Restaurants > Chick-Fil-A Chick-Fil-A (904) 810-2201 1752 US 1 South , St. Augustine , FL | Directions 32084 29.865701 -81.322801 View Website Menu Share Save Own this Business? Recommend this business? Thumbs Up Thumbs Down ? 50 % 100 2 2 Votes Add a Photo Cuisine: Fast Food , Chicken Price: $ Categories: Restaurants View More Restaurant Special Features: Cheap Eats , Carry Out , Lunch Spot Payment Methods: MasterCard, Discover, Visa, American Express View Less Site Feedback Overview Tips (2) Photos (0) Write a Tip for Chick-Fil-A Sign in to Write a Tip Write a Tip... optional
Tips for Chick-Fil-A Recommends CrssaFox Joined 3 years ago 5.0 November 07, 2009 Wonderful Service. This Chick-Fil-A location is always well-staffed. Even on their"free food day"(save the receipt to receive the same order any day that month) they had plenty of help to handle the insane crowds. We always get our food in a timely manner, and the dining room is always well-kept and clean.
A great location with friendly service - the only"down side"is that there can be large crowds any night of the week. But that just goes to show how great this restaurant is! :) … View More View Less 0 Heart Doesn't Recommend Contributor Joined 9 years ago July 29, 2005 No bones about it: crispy chicken sandwiches, buttered biscuits and signature waffle fries.. In Short This fast-food restaurant lures diners with the promise of fresh ingredients and a dependable menu. The marquee Chick-fil-A chicken sandwich is a fried breast served on a toasted bun with sliced dill pickles; other items include nuggets, strips, salads and wraps, all featuring the beloved bird. Health-conscious customers avoiding fried food can order the char-grilled chicken sandwich--same concept, one third the fat. … View More View Less 0 Heart
